page.title: 15ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: {ART/CRAFTS IN WOODHALL SPA Arts and crafts are very well served in the Martin Dales,Woodhall Spa area. While most of the classes or groups are in Woodhall Spa,Martin Dales has people who are gifted in knitting, embroidery,flower arranging,toymaking, gardening and cookery.In Woodhall there is a painting for pleasure group who meet weekly in the Methodist School room.Non painting members participate in knitting, crotchet, tatting, embroidery, modelling, carving etc; this group holds an annual exhibition when visitors come from afar.The commission on any paintings exhibited and sold from the doctors' waiting room goes to Lincolnshire Integrated Voluntary Emergency Service, which equips doctors and calls them to the scene of road traffic accidents.
